amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funds in the Renewable Energy, Energy Reliability, and Efficiency account by $40,000,000 and reduce funds in the Weapons Activities Account by $40,000,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funds in the Renewable Energy, Energy Reliability, and Efficiency account by $40,000,000 and reduce funds in the Weapons Activities Account by $40,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Takano amendment (A020) Failed by recorded vote: 166 - 250 (Roll no. 324).
